tossup_question: -   –  A certain planet has four times the mass of Earth, but the acceleration due to gravity on the planet’s surface is the same as that of Earth. What is the ratio of the planet’s radius to the Earth’s radius?
bonus_question: -   –  A ball of mass M and speed V collides with a ball of mass 2M moving toward the first ball with a speed of 1/2 V. If the two balls stick together, what will their speed after the collision be?
